boardgame.name: Las dos caras de Eva
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Ganadora del premio Rolea a la Mejor Aventura de 2018, Abraham Castro «Zero» y Zapo Valenzuela nos traen «Las dos caras de Eva», dos aventuras que recuerdan a las clásicas novelas de investigación, con un toque de thriller, suspense y sorprendentes giros finales, donde nada es lo que parece y todos ocultan oscuros secretos.

boardgame.name: Omega Sirio
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Año 2133 de Nuestro Señor. La estrella Sirio (mucho más cercana que la que fue denominada Estrella de Tabby) ha comenzado a mostrar un comportamiento similar a lo que ocurrió 118 años atrás. Esta estrella está a nuestro alcance, pues el millonario Musk, diseñó, antes de morir un motor de pulso capaz de hacernos viajar hasta Marte en cuestión de días y hacen posibles los viajes más largos. Ahora, podemos investigar las misteriosas ondas de radio que parecen proceder de la estrella.

Sois los miembros de una tripulación de 200 personas viajando a un destino que se encuentra a 20 años desde la estación orbital. Es la más ambiciosa expedición jamás enviada, y la más costosa. No se ha reparado en gastos. Los miembros de la misma han sido seleccionados como los mejores de sus campos. Entre estos 200, se encuentran los personajes.

boardgame.name: Operación Olterra
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Operación Olterra te introduce en una de las misiones de espías más desconocidas y emocionantes de la historia de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, en una localización que jamás hubieras imaginado: España. Encarna a un grupo de espías de la unidad más operativa de la marina italiana -la Décima Flotilla MAS- y conquista la pieza estratégica más importante del Mediterráneo: Gibraltar. Intérnate en el nido de espías en el que se ha convertido el Campo de Gibraltar evitando que los aliados y lugareños -que prestan sus servicios acuciados por la hambruna tras la Guerra Civil descubran tus planes. Cualquier paso en falso podría suponer que el mundo descubriera la existencia de operaciones bélicas en zona neutral: una fea herida de la que tu país no podría recuperarse jamás.

boardgame.name: La sonrisa de Anna
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

La noche cae sobre la ciudad a mediados de Septiembre de 1.948. Cinco personas aguardan en la sala de espera de la morgue de la comisaría: Logan Green, detective de homicidios; Natalya Soboleva, crítica escritora contra la sociedad norteamericana; Drake Steel, detective privado; Jay Marsala, investigador de seguros; y Ernest DeWitt, periodista sin escrúpulos.
A los cinco les une una única cosa: Anna Green, quien ha sido hallada muerta hace apenas unas horas en un callejón olvidado de la ciudad mostrando la aterradora “sonrisa de Glasgow”, tal y como ya ocurriera un año antes en la ciudad de Los Ángeles con Elizabeth Shore, la infame “Dalia Negra”.
¿El asesino de la Dalia estará actuando de nuevo?, ¿Qué intereses ocultos tiene cada uno de los personajes en esta historia?, ¿es todo tan simple como aparenta, o quizá hay algo más en el fondo de las motivaciones de cada uno de los implicados?
La Dalia Roja / La Sonrisa de Anna es un intrincado caso para Hardboiled que reproduce las enrevesadas tramas y giros propios del género negro, haciendo que los personajes estén implicados directamente en los sucesos que se presentan y deban jugar con sus cartas bien ocultas si quieren conseguir sus propios objetivos.

boardgame.name: Hogar lejos del hogar
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Está usted viajando a través de otra dimensión; una dimensión más allá de los sentidos, una dimensión de la mente. Un viaje a una tierra maravillosa y terrible cuyos únicos límites son los de la imaginación. Esta usted entrando en la Dimensión Desconocida.

¿El año? 1958. ¿El lugar? La pequeña localidad de Billings, Ohio. ¿Los protagonistas? Los Johnson. Una aparente familia normal y corriente dispuesta a pasar un fin de semana apacible en una pequeña cabaña junto al lago Kitikoe. Poco pueden imaginar que antes de que termine el día recibirán una sorprendente visita… procedente de la Dimensión Desconocida.

boardgame.name: Puzzling Places
boardgame.description:
From the publisher website:

Puzzling Places is a relaxing and wholesome 3D jigsaw puzzle where players put together hyper-realistic miniatures of beautiful places from around the globe.

By establishing a meditative and calm atmosphere, the game focuses on achievable challenges and a tangible feeling of progression and completion. With every piece puzzled, each “place” slowly comes to life with an immersive and serene soundscape and visuals.

Puzzling Places is a modern take on an age-old pastime that’s fun for the whole family, thanks to its simple rules and easy controls.

+ A variety of puzzles featuring beautiful Photogrammetry scans from around the world!

+ An audio-rich experience with immersive soundscapes and satisfying sound effects.

+ Unlockable audio Hotspots - Listen to the place come alive as you puzzle!

+ Comfort features including Force-Pull, Puzzle Groups, See-Through, and more.

+ Flexible playstyle - A seated or Roomscale experience.

boardgame.name: Screen Test: Stranger Things
boardgame.description:
Tune in to Stranger Things and get ready to play. Your game card says "flickering lights." On the screen, the Demogorgon threatens and the Upside Down looms. Yes, the lights are blinking. You've got the card! Shout it out and earn points to win.

With 300 cards featuring Stranger Things characters, places, actions, and dialogue.

—description from the front of the box

Netflix subscription, compatible device, and Internet connection required.

—description from the front of the box

boardgame.name: Esper's Emporium of Esoterica
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

A wondrous tome of 5e options for players and fans and GMs


New character class- the paragon- a fated soul from the pages of myth
Class options for barbarian, cleric, fighter, monk, and warlock
Ichoriite and swamp dwarf races
Feats, spells, magic items, cursed and flawed magic items
Magic shops, which include a simple commerce mechanic, shopkeepers, shop stats, and plot hooks
GM advice, arena combat, traps and hazards, skill encounters
Over 170 new monsters and NPC's, such as astral dragon, adamantine golem, conder hag, keeper of lost things, grandmother willow, nychtasphinx, and the legendary cursed warrior, Blacktongue

boardgame.name: Zombie Escape
boardgame.description:
The story:
You find yourself lost and alone in an unfamiliar neighborhood, surrounded by zombies. You need to find shelter and you need to find it fast. You see a main house with a car in the driveway and you decide to take a chance; hoping you can find shelter and safety. You start your search with the car in the hopes of finding keys to the house or to some well needed supplies. It’s a start and with more zombies heading your way, it might be your only chance.

Synopsis:
Zombie Escape is a game with dice rolling, placement and movement. You must enter and search multiple locations to find supplies and shelter from the zombie horde. Once you reach the main house you must clear it of zombies inside and out to give you a final place of safety to win the game.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: La larga noche en Anzaverde
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

De camino a un nuevo destino, nuestros aguerridos aventureros se verán obligados a cruzar el valle de Anzaverde, lugar en el que se asienta la pequeña y pintoresca aldea homónima, de la que se dicen que sus gentes gozan de una inusitada fertilidad.
Pero algo va mal cuando los aventureros se acercan al lugar… todo parece desierto, menos por la presencia de un campesino que pronto se da la vuelta para enseñar las tripas le cuelgan del abdomen. Es hora huir o morir hacia el único refugio que parece haber en el lugar: una antigua gruta al límite de la aldea donde el poder de una deidad local parece ser capaz de mantener a raya a los escasos supervivientes del ataque de una pequeña hueste de no muertos.
Los aventureros deben encontrar una forma de lidiar con los refugiados, al tiempo que se ven asediados por fuerzas de no muertos, y a su vez tratando de cumplir con una de las tradiciones locales que exige sacrificios cruentos a cambio de mantener a raya un terrible mal que ha permanecido años encerrado en el lugar.

boardgame.name: Maid RPG Item Cards
boardgame.description:
This is a set of 216 cards for use with Maid: The Role-Playing Game, providing a card for each of the items in the massive d666 table from the rulebook! That's kind of an excessive amount of cards, but then this is Maid RPG after all!

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Maid RPG Event Cards
boardgame.description:
This is a set of 36 cards for use with Maid: The Role-Playing Game, each of which has the basic (Contemporary, Fantasy, and Space) Random Event table entries.

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: Schoolgirl RPG Cards
boardgame.description:
This set of 72 cards lets you generate characters for Schoolgirl RPG with lightning speed! Just shuffle each of the two types of cards separately, draw a card from each, and presto! You have your own weird schoolgirl! It's kinda neat and super-fast!

- from the publisher's blurb

boardgame.name: La vida oculta de Vicente Puig
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

“La vida oculta de Vicente Puig” sumergirá a tus jugadores en una truculenta partida de investigación. En ella, una preocupada esposa contrata los servicios del grupo de investigadores para que encuentren a su esposo, del que no tiene noticias desde hace días. Para descubrir la verdad que se oculta detrás del caso, tus jugadores tendrán que poner a prueba sus capacidades detectivescas, tratar con personajes corruptos con mucho que perder, repartir puñetazos en las caras correctas y seguir rastros en los lugares más peligrosos de las Vegas.

Todo esto mientras caminan por el filo de la navaja de la ética y se exponen a la posibilidad de una muerte cierta a cada paso. Si te gustan la investigación y la intriga; si vibras con la emoción de una buena pelea de bar; si te encanta Las Vegas; si necesitas llegar al “fondo del asunto” y emocionarte con él; si crees que puedes adentrarte en lo peor del alma humana y volver sin un rasguño; si en definitiva, quieres convertirte en un auténtico detective, “La vida oculta de Vicente Puig” es tu aventura.

boardgame.name: Estrellas errantes
boardgame.description:
From the book:

El ser humano ha abandonado el maltratado planeta Tierra. El desarrollo de los viajes espaciales, gracias a un nuevo elemento encontrado en los anillos de Saturno —el opsio—, ha permitido descubrir especies alienígenas inteligentes con las que se han forjado alianzas y librado guerras.

La Humanidad se encuentra dispersa por las estrellas, formando colonias en los planetas con más recursos y mejores condiciones atmosféricas. Nadie sabe hasta qué recóndito mundo habrán llegado las naves expedicionarias más atrevidas, ni a qué maravillas o peligros pueden haberse enfrentado.

boardgame.name: Malas compañías - Una historia de piratas
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

La nave Siri recorre el sistema Nébula con su variopinta tripulación a bordo: una capitana con deudas pendientes que no puede pagar ni con su pico de oro; un pirata que busca respuestas sin hacer preguntas; un joven hacker tan curioso como inconsciente; y un porcino con poderes psiónicos. Sí, un hombre-cerdo.

Embárcate con los protagonistas en una historia de piratas espaciales que te llevará a recorrer los suburbios de EDÉN, una megaciudad que reúne a la peor calaña de la galaxia.
Códice Grupo Creativo y Yipi Ka Yei! se unen para traer esta primera aventura autoconclusiva del universo «Malas Compañías» para Estrellas Errantes, dando pie al inicio de una ambientación que seguirá desarrollándose en posteriores módulos con el objetivo de crear una base donde cada Guardián Estelar pueda inventar nuevas historias.

boardgame.name: El árbol de la vida
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

“El árbol de la vida” es la aventura ganadora del sorteo entre módulos que se presentaron a concurso en las NetCon17, siendo la finalista editada y maquetada por Códice, para que cualquiera de vosotros pudiese publicar con nosotros una aventura con un acabado cuidado y atractivo.

Durante la segunda guerra mundial, un pequeño grupo de personajes del bando aliado, sin nada que perder, deberán ir a contrarreloj para seguir los pasos del Doctor Hummel y la división Anherberbe; quienes han descubierto el emplazamiento de un maravilloso objeto que dará la inmortalidad a Hitler: El Árbol de la Vida. Los jugadores viajarán por todo el mundo en busca de los secretos que oculta este poderoso objeto, intentando adelantarse a los planes del doctor y atraparle con vida… o no; tú decides. Si te gustan las partidas de investigación, el misticismo oculto en la historia del mundo y las aventuras, “El árbol de la vida” está hecha para ti.

boardgame.name: Reflect: La course aux miroirs
Reflect: Mirror Mazes
boardgame.description:
A lot of different mazes to do while you look at them in a mirror.

In two players game, each player has the same maze and the fastest player to reach the exit of the maze whithout crossing a wall win.

boardgame.name: Mítica y Asombrosa Deo: 01. Larula
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

«Desgasta tus botas en sus calles hasta que seas capaz de notar el empedrado bajo tus suelas, siente el olor dulzón del metal de los talleres de cobre inundando tus fosas nasales cuando atravieses la puerta del oso».
Adéntrate en la Mítica y Asombrosa Deo.

boardgame.name: Bad Things
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

“Bad Things” es la aventura ganadora del primer desafío que desde CÓDICE organizamos hace ya un tiempo, para que cualquiera de vosotros pudiese publicar con nosotros una aventura con un acabado cuidado y atractivo.

En ella un pequeño grupo de investigadores deberán resolver un macabro crimen ocurrido hace años en una pequeña localidad de la América profunda: Raven ́s Valley. Todos los pueblos tienen sus pecados, y aunque en este no todos sus habitantes son asesinos, sí que parece que tienen algo que ocultar…Los jugadores deberán bucear en los secretos de los habitantes del pueblo y ayudar al sheriff a atrapar al asesino que hay entre ellos.

Si te gustan las partidas de investigación de crímenes oscuros; la emoción de no saber nunca si estás hablando o no con el asesino al que intentas atrapar; las ambientaciones macabras; los personajes atormentados por sus pecados del pasado y sobretodo, los finales duros de digerir, pero geniales de disfrutar, “Bad Things” es tu aventura.

boardgame.name: Misión Delta - Extensión 11/3
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

“Misión Delta Extensión 11/3” es una escalofriante aventura de terror espacial que te llevará hasta los confines del universo para rescatar a la Zelonia, una nave científica que órbita en torno a un enigmático planeta en el que parece que se encuentra el secreto de la vida eterna…
Sin embargo, todo tiene un precio, y a veces ese precio es aún más alto que el premio que se desea conseguir.

En este módulo tus jugadores se verán inmersos en la oscuridad de los pasillos de una nave fantasma, con la sospecha creciente de que su gobierno les oculta algo, y con el constante temor a un ataque desde cualquier esquina por parte de unos seres voraces e insaciables que parecen venir de todas partes y de ninguna a la vez.

Si te gusta sentir el intenso escalofrío de una buena historia de terror, Misión Delta es tu aventura.

boardgame.name: Unknown: Mentes en blanco
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Unknown es un módulo que pretende ser una interpretación de la película “Mentes en blanco” (“Unknown”, 2006).

La aventura comienza con los personajes despertando en un entorno y situación que les son desconocidos habida cuenta del episodio de amnesia que parecen sufrir. Esta falta de recuerdos va desapareciendo a medida que pasa el tiempo pero también esto juega en contra de los personajes, puesto que dichos recuerdos les podrá poner en bandos contrarios, con secuestradores y secuestrados compartiendo el mismo espacio. Sus aparentes captores o causantes de su circunstancia están próximos a llegar a la fábrica abandonada donde han recuperado la consciencia.

boardgame.name: Ride the Rails: England/Wales
boardgame.description:
Ride the Rails: England/Wales is an expansion for Ride the Rails that can also be used with the Winsome original Rail USA. The game is for 3-5 players, takes less an hour, with one page of expansion rules.

The game covers the entire nation on two 11x17 inch color maps. Among other elements, some railway stockholders will substantially benefit from the bonus supplied when the conditions are met for the British Railways Act of Parliament of 1921.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Rail USA
Ride the Rails

boardgame.name: Punta hueca
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

PUNTA HUECA es una aventura adaptada al sistema Hitos, en la que los jugadores encarnan a un grupo de ladrones que son contratados para realizar un atraco. El dinero sucio obtenido, por última vez, será la llave para abrir la puerta de una nueva vida donde los sueños si pueden hacerse realidad. Una aventura trepidante donde las dificultades, propias de la ciudad de Nueva York, se unen al múltiple colorido y la máxima seguridad característicos del evento deportivo más importante del año: la Super Bowl.

boardgame.name: Rescate en Corona Negra
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

La aventura sitúa a los personajes en una misión de rescate en unas tierras desconocidas y misteriosas, separadas del mundo civilizado por una imponente frontera brumosa.

boardgame.name: La Dama de Hierro
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

“La dama de hierro” es una aventura esencialmente típica, en el que los protagonistas son contratados para que recuperen un antiguo artefacto de unas viejas ruinas, nada que seguramente no jugaras con anterioridad. Sin embargo, se presentan varias situaciones que pondrán a prueba a nuestros personajes de forma un tanto atípica, pues en gran medida el núcleo de la aventura se centra en la toma de decisiones “difíciles” en diferentes escalas, desde decisiones que puedan afectar a individuos a otras que pueden alterar las relaciones diplomáticas del país, o incluso averiguar hasta donde están dispuestos a llegar por el oro o el honor… no hay decisiones correctas o incorrectas. Tan solo actos y consecuencias.

boardgame.name: La misteriosa muerte de Karen Swenson
boardgame.description:
Publisher Blurb:

La aventura que nos ocupa pretende ser la introducción a una campaña basada en la ambientación de la Llamada de Cthulhu (LldC), Delta Green, publicado en castellano por La Factoría de Ideas. La campaña quiere presentarse como una libre elección de casos que los personajes irán intentando resolver. Algunos están ligados a la trama principal y otros son ajenos a ella. El entorno no es muy Cthulhesco inicialmente y las pérdidas de Cordura (COR) serán bajas, pero es algo que puede modificarse a libre elección del Guardián. Como siempre, la aventura es tuya y puedes jugarla como quieras. Se recomienda leer la ambientación, por supuesto, aunque dispones de la toda información necesaria para jugarla.

boardgame.name: Calima
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Junio de 2010. Una ola de calor recorre el sur de los Estados Unidos. La ropa se pega al cuerpo por culpa del sudor, cuesta trabajo respirar. Un domingo cualquiera, Zack Middleton, un joven normal, buen estudiante y buen chico, aparece muerto tras haberse suicidado en su habitación. Nadie se lo cree aún, Zack estaba bien, ¿no?

Calima es un escenario corto para La Llamada de Cthulhu 7ª edición en la época actual para uno o dos jugadores y Guardián, aunque es fácilmente adaptable a más jugadores. En él los personajes tendrán que investigar el suicidio de Zack Middleton, descubriendo en el proceso, que no todo es lo que parece, que hay cosas que es mejor dejar quietas, y que la ambición desmedida puede tener consecuencias.

Se incluyen dos personajes pregenerados, las ayudas necesarias y el enlace a una playlist de ambientación creada expresamente para esta partida.

boardgame.name: Nåt Ska Bort
boardgame.description:
A challenging trivia game where the players have to figure out which option, out of five, doesn't belong with the others.

If you answer correctly you get to answer tricky follow-up questions. If you answer these correctly you get to place one of your markers on the board.

The first player to place all of their markers on the board wins!

—user summary

boardgame.name: Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Age of Darkness
boardgame.description:
An Age of Darkness has descended upon the galaxy. Horus Lupercal, Warmaster of the Emperor's armies, has turned against his gene-father and sent the Imperium spiralling into bloody civil war. Of the eighteen great Space Marine Legions, finest of all humanity's soldiers, fully half have sided with the traitorous Warmaster, while the remainder stand staunchly loyal to the Emperor. It is a war of brother against brother, Space Marine against Space Marine, which has seen the might of the Imperium's vast armies turned upon itself in a cataclysm of fire and blood.

In Warhammer: The Horus Heresy you will pit mighty armies of superhuman warriors against each other in apocalyptic tabletop battles. Choose your favoured Legion, from the knightly Dark Angels to the duplicitous Alpha Legion, build your own army from a range of spectacular Citadel and Forge World miniatures, and clash with fellow players in wargames of staggering tactical depth. The tale of the Horus Heresy is the bedrock of Warhammer 40,000's rich history, and this boxed game is the perfect first step to joining the epic conflicts that reshaped the galaxy.

The titanic Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Age of Darkness boxed set contains a treasure trove of content, from a massive rulebook detailing the setting and stories of the Horus Heresy, as well as gorgeous photography and art, and all the core rules you need to play the game. The box also contains 54 Citadel miniatures – including a massive Spartan Assault Tank and a host of MKVI 'Corvus Armour' Tactical Marines – allowing you to build two opposing forces for out-of-the-box play, or construct a huge Legion force all your own. Alongside all of this, you'll get all the game accessories and rules reference materials you need to immerse yourself in the worlds of the Age of Darkness.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Age of Darkness Rulebook
Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Liber Astares Loyalist Legiones Astartes Book
Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Liber Hereticus Traitor Legiones Astartes Army Book
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: The Horus Heresy: Betrayal at Calth
The Horus Heresy: Burning of Prospero

boardgame.name: Heros Fusion: Starter Pack #1
boardgame.description:
With this first starter pack, 2 players can play right out of the box with preconstructed decks !

Heros Fusion is a collectible card game that uses characters from the Heros Fusion novels.

Before the game, players need to build their own deck of 20 cards, cards that come in four different classes : super heroes, villains, allies and animated objects.

Players will fight to build the best team of super heroes on the table !

On his turn, a player has 2 actions. There are 3 possible actions : draw a card, play a card (and eventually its effect), or use the power of a card that is already on the table. It's that simple ! Of course, cards will interact with each other, and players will have to correctly manage them to be efficient.

The first player that reaches a Power Level of 25 with his active cards triggers the endgame ; all other players get a last turn. Then, the player with the most powerful team wins the game!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Dominion: Hinterlands (Second Edition)
boardgame.description:
The world is big and your kingdom small. Small when compared to the world, that is; it's moderate-sized when compared to other kingdoms. But in a big world like this one - big when compared to smaller worlds anyway, if such things exist; it's moderate-sized when compared to worlds of roughly the same size, and a little small when compared to worlds just a little larger - well, to make a long story short - short when compared to longer stories anyway - it is time to stretch your borders. You've heard of far-off places - exotic countries, where they have pancakes but not waffles, where the people wear the wrong number of shirts, and don't even have a word for the look two people give each other when they each hope that the other will do something that they both want done but which neither of them wants to do. It is to these lands that you now turn your gaze.

Dominion: Hinterlands is the sixth addition to the game of Dominion. It adds 26 new Kingdom cards to Dominion, including 20 Actions, 3 Treasures, 3 Victory cards, and 3 Reactions. The central theme is cards that do something immediately when you buy them or gain them.

Dominion: Hinterlands (Second Edition) contains nine new types of Kingdom cards, which will be released on their own as an update pack (Dominion: Hinterlands – Update Pack) for those who own the first edition of this expansion.

-description from publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Dominion (Second Edition)
Dominion (Second Edition) Big Box
Dominion: Big Box
Dominion: Big Box
Dominion: Intrigue
Dominion: Special Edition

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: The Medievil Mishap
boardgame.description:
A MINISTRY OF TIME ADVENTURE
Agent Lance Steele needs your help! A mysterious disppearance in the Middle Ages... are there dark forces afoot? Embark on a sprawling, immersive puzzle adventure from the comfort of your living room!

Escape room in an envelope game - Time travel to Medievil England to investigate a mystery

boardgame.name: Kakuro Master
boardgame.description:
In this mixture of Sudoku and Crossword the Players try to gain Points by putting the numbers best on the playmat. Each number can only placed once per column and row. The sum per row and column must match the given checksum.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Cryptic Explorers: The Alpha Return
boardgame.description:
The Alpha Return expansion box provides new content for the base Cryptic Explorers tabletop game.
Play through the doomed first mission of the Cryptonauts into the Realms of Death - the Alpha Return.
Includes 3 new Goddesses and 6 new Cryptonauts, as well as the Alpha Return novella.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Cryptic Explorers

boardgame.name: wrestLEgacy
boardgame.description:
wrestLEgacy is a scalable legacy board game that places 3-5 players at the heart of the professional wrestling world: behind the scenes. Each game builds on previous play, with wrestlers learning new moves and skills, promoters acquiring new territories, and titles gaining extensive lineages and legacies. One pack of wrestLEgacy is designed for at least twelve unique plays where the game continues to evolve, until your custom universe is set. wrestLEgacy offers multiple territories, so you can enjoy the bravado of worldwide sports entertainment juggernauts, the wild world of lucha libre, southern 'rasslin, and/or Japanese strong style. Players can combine territories for even larger play experiences - scaling the experience up to 30 simultaneous players.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: 易妖战记 (Yi Yao Zhan Ji)
boardgame.description:
易妖战记 (Yi Yao Zhan Ji / Battle of Dynasty) is a 2-player battle game. Each player controls a different faction, fighting for the secret power of Yao. The winner will be the creator of the next dynasty in this fantasy world.

There are 4 factions in the game: “兽侠 (Beast Warrior)” can activate their units immediately after deploying. “方士 (Necromancers)” can summon zombies to fight for them. “仙人 (Celestial)” can push enemy units back when attacking. “龙宫 (Sea Serpent)” are good at healing.

Units are divided into 3 ranks: hero, elite and common. Each faction has their special ability and hero ability. You can choose the faction most fit for you.

boardgame.name: 12 Chinese Zodiac
十二生肖
boardgame.description:
A long time ago, people always forget which year they were born, and they don't know how many years they have lived. The Jade God decided to hold a cross-river contest in order to solve his people's problems. He named the top twelve animals who win as the Chinese Zodiac Signs, and counted as years.

Time passed by. After ten thousand years, you, as animals of Zodiac, are not satisfied with the result from before. You beg the Jade God for another race. This time, the race will held on the field. The twelve animals will use their own strength to win this time.

The player will chose one animal with its special power to start the game. There will be one map with eight terrain sections for the race. The active player throw three dice and all players will play one card of their 9 running cards in hand to run and may activate their skill during running. Game ends when there is only 1 animal left on the track. The first animal to run through finishing line is the winner. Others are ranked by arrival order.

boardgame.name: Quintuple
boardgame.description:
An abstract game for two. Players take turns placing or moving dice on a 3 x 3 grid. Each die's value determines how many spaces it moves. A player's token changes the value of all dice on a chosen row when placed next to it. First player to place all their dice on the grid wins.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Detective: City of Angels – Investigation Sheets
boardgame.description:
An extra 50 double-sided investigation sheets for Detective City of Angels

- description from the publisher's web site

boardgame.name: Aegis (Issue 2 - 2021)
boardgame.description:
Aegis en un e-zine sin ánimo de lucro creado por y para aficionados de Ars Magica.
Nº 2 − Otoño de 2021

boardgame.name: Twilight of the Britons
boardgame.description:
Fast play miniatures wargames rules for the Dark Age (AD 410-1054) British islands.

Like the other games in the "Twilight" family, close combat and shooting are folded into the morale rules: the effect of being shot at or attacked in melee is simply to check morale. Units that fail too many morale checks rout and are removed.

As is appropriate for the "Arthurian" era, there is considerable scope for heroic leaders to affect the course of battle.

The rules are compatible with any basing as long as all units have the same frontage.

boardgame.name: Darwin's Journey: Fireland Expansion
boardgame.description:
The Fireland Expansion includes a new map and alternative board layout with new mechanisms and additional content. It contains:


4 Wooden ships
4 Wooden explorers
4 coloured wooden discs
4 Special Action tiles
2 Player Objective tiles
2 Crew Cards
21 Adventure Cards (land and ocean)
20 wooden Adventure tokens
4 Adventure Player Aid cards
6 Observation score tokens
6 Time tiles
8 cardboard Time seals
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Darwin's Journey

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: 15 dice of civilization
boardgame.description:
15 dice of civilization is a 2 player dice game where you roll the dice to place a dice. Goal of the games is to complete your civilization board with proper dice colour and value.
Game round starts with the roll of 6 action dice with which you perform various actions in order place your civilization dice on the board in the right order and value.
15 dice of civilization is a quick dice game where you don't need only luck but also little bit of wit.
If you have two base boxes you can play the game with more than 2 players.

boardgame.name: Who Knows?
boardgame.description:
How well do you know what everyone else knows? Bet wisely or guess right to score big!

The multiple choice answers are shown but the question remains a mystery!

The host for the round guesses what the question could be and bets on who wont know the right answer...

Then the question is revealed. Players who answer correctly, win the point token they were given. Whoever gets it wrong loses the points to the host!

At the end of the game, whoever has the most points, wins! If there is a draw, the team with the highest single token wins.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Sisco
boardgame.description:
Goal of the game: To discover a word composed by the game leader and thus win the maximum number of points.


The game master forms a word from 5 vowels and 5 consonants, and arranges the letters in the letter holder. The other players will try to discover the word by guessing its letters.
Each player in turn rolls the Letters die which allows them to suggest a vowel or a consonant.
Each time a letter is correctly guessed, the game master opens the corresponding flap of the letter holder and the player who guessed it scores the points on the letter tile.
Then, whatever the result of their guess, they roll the Sisco die, which can give them a second chance to play, or even better, let them guess the word or double their points.
The players must find the word very quickly because the game master scores the total points for the word each round of turns.


After each player has a turn as game master, the player with the highest score wins.

—description from the back of the box (modified)

boardgame.name: You’re My Lobster
boardgame.description:
Out of your friends, who knows which tv show you last binge watched? or how you like your eggs? Find out how well you and your buds know each other and discover who's your lobster in this hilarious party game.

Taking it in turns to pick up a question card, write down your answers on your colour coded whiteboards and reveal your guesses. For extra points you can also nominate which player you think will get it right with your nomination tokens!

Check your scorecard at the end of the game to see who knows you best, they're your lobster!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Look at the Stars
boardgame.description:
Tonight the sky is full of stars. How about drawing the constellations before daybreak?
Reveal a night card, and then simultaneously all draw the shape on your card.
At the end of the game, score points for the constellations of different sizes that you have created, as well as planets, shooting stars and other bonuses...

Up to 8 players can play simultaneously!

Many different bonus cards to play again and again!

Satisfaction of creating a beautiful starry sky!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Written in the Cards
boardgame.description:
Flex your story telling skills and flaunt your fortune telling abilities to create ridiculous readings for your friends and family.

Roll the dice and let fate decide the subject and the style of your fortune reading. For example, if the seeker rolled 'love' and 'hilarious' on the two dice. They pose a question about love to the rest of the group.
"will I ever find the one by swiping right"

Then, each player creates a prophecy for the seeker by consulting their cards and combining an image with a phrase, they then create a story around their cards to make a reading for you.

The seeker awards a point to the most hilarious and another to their favourite scenario.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Colossus
boardgame.description:
Colossus is a solo card game that takes less than 20 minutes to play.

You play as the warrior Nethopha and your objective is to defeat the colossus Og.

Play your Action cards by superimposing them in the play area, respecting these two rules:


Each card must be played vertically and upright.
Each card you place must cover exactly two squares (two medallions) of a card already present in the playing area.


Following this, the visible medallions are your stats.

Compare your stats to the stats of the Colossus card in play, and see if you have enough visible medallions to weaken Og, grapple Og (so you don't fall), unlock powerful cards, and/or scale Og.

Reach the top of the Colossus and give it the final blow to annihilate it.

—description from the publisher

Colossus est un jeu de cartes solitaire qui se joue en moins de 20 minutes.

Vous incarnez le guerrier Néthopha et votre objectif est de vaincre le colosse Og.

Jouez vos cartes Actions en les superposant dans la zone de jeu en respectant ces deux règles :


Chaque carte doit être jouée verticalement et à l’endroit.
Chaque carte que vous posez doit recouvrir exactement deux cases (deux médaillons) d’une carte déjà présente dans la zone de jeu.


À la suite de cela, les médaillons visibles constituent vos statistiques.

Comparez vos statistiques aux statistiques de la carte Colosse qui est en jeu, et vérifiez si vous avez suffisamment de médaillons visibles pour affaiblir Og, vous agrippez à Og (afin de ne pas tomber), débloquer des cartes puissantes et/ou escalader Og.

Atteignez le sommet du Colosse et donnez-lui le coup final pour l’anéantir.

—description from the publisher (French)

boardgame.name: Nova Force
boardgame.description:
User summary:

High Adventure in the Year 8919

A science-fiction RPG set in the year 8919 that plays up high-tech characters and items like battlesuits.

boardgame.name: Monster Lands 2
boardgame.description:
Monster Lands 2 is the sequel to Monster Lands, a competitive dice-placement game that combines resource management, worker placement, and fun combat, ranked #6 in Tom Vasel’s all time Top 10 of Dice Placement games and awarded Best Game by Spanish Authors 2018.

In Monster Lands 2 we “turn the tables”. Instead of playing with clans of mercenaries against marauding monsters, you now swap roles, taking on the role of hordes of fearsome monsters who fight off attacking humans. YOU are the monster player! Instead of looking for the favor of the Queen, you now work towards becoming the most infamous horde, competing to win the approval of the Great Entity of the Beast realm and be named Megalomonster.

Your hordes are made up of different types of monsters, the most powerful of which are your champions. Each champion (represented in the game as card) has an ability and brings along further monsters (represented as dice or tokens) to be used in battles and other assignments. Send your champions to perform different tasks in your territory, have them lead battle against the “evil” humans, or fight it out with your fellow monster hordes for rewards in the champions’ arena. You can acquire mutations, armor, reinforcements, health berries, chillies, and more, all with a dice placement mechanic that not only requires planning of the right timing, but also of the right dice/tokens to be used in each job. Lots of new and different places await you, making Monster Lands 2 a very rewarding experience for Monster Lands 1 players, while at the same time working perfectly stand-alone (you don’t need Monster Lands 1 to play Monster Lands 2).

Wait, did we tell you that your monsters include mulfins? The mulfins, those little buggers, tend to explode, so be warned when handling them. But then again, your monsters still feed on their remains if they do explode ... after all, a monster has to eat.

Who is going to be the most infamous monster horde?

boardgame.name: The Darkness of Kasta
boardgame.description:
from the publishers blurb:

The Darkness of Kasta
A great starting adventure that introduces you to the Grimstone RPG universe!

Overview
A strange incident invokes fear and doubts in the people of Kasta, a remote town that suffered greatly after the Royal War. Since then, the People of Kasta have always found ways to coexist peacefully, regardless of origin or creed. However, doubt and fear might awaken one's worst instincts and Kastian people might soon face new trials.

Includes extra encounters & battlemaps.

boardgame.name: Mystic Forces First Edition
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

You are Shinkai, gifted with the ability to control the five Mystic Forces with which you can learn the art of conjuring to do battle with your enemies. Roast your opponents with searing balls of fire, stagger the fiercest of opponents with fiery bolts of lightning, summon raging storms, and much more.

It is now the year 600 AA and the struggle to reclaim Oryathar from the grip of the Shadow is in full Flight. Kings of all lands are pouring their resources into the restoration of the Defenders of the Light and their once mighty fort cities. The forces of the Light are still greatly outnumbered, but with the rebirth of the Shinkai events are bound to change.

Choose among five unique races; the small and nimble Brightling who are able to communicate telepathically and sense even the most subtle magical energies.
The stout and durable Grak who possess unrivaled willpower and a powerful physique to back it up. The agile, long-armed Loremek whose agility is unparalleled. The cat-eyed Valkin who is capable of seeing in total darkness. The massive Warlum whose physical endurance and stone-like skin makes them truly formidable warriors.

Learn the art of enchantment and harness the powers of the Mystic Forces to create your own magical items or transform yourself into a Dragonknight; a truly powerful dragon-like creature capable of flying and performing lethal breath attacks.

The land may yet fall to the Shadow, but not without a fight, not as long as you, Shinkai, still retain hope, You have been born to come forth and reclaim the lands from the Shadow and restore the true name of the Defenders of the Light! You have
the ability to stand against the Shadow and to see that the Light prevails once more!
But be careful, for the influence of the forces of evil are great, and you too could fall into the hands of the SHADOW!

A supercharged dose of epic fantasy! Experience the intensely mystical world of Oryathaar in this exciting new fantasy role-playing game!

boardgame.name: The Dance
boardgame.description:
The Dance is a game for two to six players. Each player controls a vampire clan attending a grand ball at a palace in the late 19th Century. Each vampire family is represented in play by an avatar, a game piece representing the family member selected to move about the dance floor and attempt to gather support from dancers to expand influence and solidify power.

—description from the introduction

The Dance was published in issue five of One Small Step's rebooted "Ares Magazine."

boardgame.name: MURKS 1993
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb (Translated with deepl):
Tired of playing faceless fantasy, horror or science fiction characters all the time? Do you want to try something really innovative and crazy? So something far more caper than six-pack clones in a dystopian world, dinosaur scientists, rats, Dallas protagonists, Smurfs, stuffed animals, or even battle nuns? Well, then the time has finally, finally come for MURKS 1993, My Useless Hubcap Game, which has been waiting 26 years to be completed and is easily the most insane pen & paper system of ALL TIME.

A hubcap? Yes, in this system you play a hubcap. So? You can't? Oh, yes, you can. Quite well, in fact. Be so good and give us a chance, get rid of your elven knight mage thief and take on the role of a bailiff, nobleman or mercenary. Ten archetypes are at your disposal (one better than the other).

There are very few print versions that have been created by Kai Ellermann and have been gifted to friends only.

Original text in German
Seid Ihr es leid, ständig gesichtslose Fantasy-, Horror- oder Science-Fiction-Charaktere zu spielen? Wollt Ihr einmal etwas tatsächlich Innovativ-Beklopptes in Angriff nehmen? Also etwas weit Kaputteres als Klone im Sechserpack in einer dystopischen Welt, Dinosaurier-Wissenschaftler, Ratten, Dallas-Protagonisten, Schlümpfe, Plüschtiere oder gar Kampfnonnen? Na, dann ist endlich, endlich die Zeit für MURKS 1993, Mein Unbrauchbares RadKappenSpiel, gekommen, welches seit 26 Jahren darauf gewartet hat, fertiggestellt zu werden und mit Sicherheit das wahnwitzigste Pen-&-Paper-System ALLER ZEITEN darstellt.

Eine Radkappe? Ja, in diesem System spielst du eine Radkappe. Und? Geht nicht? Oh, doch, das geht. Sogar ziemlich gut. Sei so gut und gib uns eine Chance, löse Dich von Deinem Elfenrittermagierdieb und übernehme die Rolle eines Gammlers, Adeligen oder Söldners. Zehn Archetypen stehen Dir zur Verfügung (einer besser als der andere).

boardgame.name: Choco Battle
boardgame.description:
Children's game about collecting chocolates with different flavours.
Game includes two game variants - Easy for kids from 4 years and Full Choco Battle for kids from 6 years.
In your turn you can either play a pair of chocolates(cards) with the same flavour or ask one card from one of the oponents.
When you are successful you gain one piece of chocolate to your player board.
During the game you can use some jokers which introduce little bit of bluffing and memory to the game play.

boardgame.name: Cat Cafe Manager
boardgame.description:
In Cat Cafe Manager, you play as the proprietor of a small, abandoned cat cafe in the countryside village of Caterwaul Way, left to you by your grandmother. Besides hiring staff and fixing the place up, you also have to take care of and eventually adopt some of the many stray cats that roam the streets. Each cat is unique, with its own look, stats, and personality. It's your job to pick out the right combination of cats for your cafe to please and relax your customers.

You'll soon get to know all the different folks that live in Caterwaul Way, such as Finley, a young musician trying to make it big, or Bonner, the local ferryman who tells a lot of very tall stories. As you get to know them better you can start to uncover clues about the mysterious shrine dedicated to an ancient cat god, giving you glimpses of the strange history of the town of Caterwaul Way and its many stray cats.

Source: Publisher's website

boardgame.name: All You Can Eat
boardgame.description:
It's a race to stuff your face in this card collecting game.

Players take turns serving a selection of cards - some face up, some face down. See who likes it hot and spicy by taking a chance or who will play it safe and only select the cards they can see?

The deck consists of four different types of cuisine, Mexican, East Asian, Mediterranean & South Asian - each type has a pudding card that scores you an extra point. The aim of the game is to score points by collecting matching cuisine combos and avoiding the clumsy waiter 'action' cards.

The points you score for each set are shown on the cards, be careful as chillies can be minus points!

Fill up on the highest scoring food combinations to claim victory.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Die Vergessenen Chroniken - Grundregelwerk
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb (translated with deepl):
The Forgotten Chronicles is a pen & paper role-playing game and, with its simply designed rules, is aimed primarily at beginners. We have taken care to make the rules modular. This means that rules you don't like can easily be left out or adapted. But if you are looking for a real challenge, add our optional rules explicitly! This will enhance your gaming experience even if you have years of experience.

You can expect 12 races, from ghostly to animalistic, with lovely illustrations and detailed backstories. They can all learn from 260 magical talents and unleash their innate powers! You alone decide how to combine the talents with each other. For example, a black mage will be able to rattle his swords with scorching fire and a healer will be able to play fascinating instruments!

On over 300 pages you will find everything you need to know about our races, talents, equipment, antagonists and mystical places in Verej'ka!

Original German text:
Die vergessenen Chroniken ist ein Pen & Paper Rollenspiel und richtet sich mit seinen einfach gestalteten Regeln vorwiegend an Einsteiger. Dabei haben wir darauf geachtet, die Spielregeln modular zu gestalten. Das heißt, Regeln die dir nicht gefallen, kannst du problemlos weg lassen oder anpassen. Wenn du aber eine richtige Herausforderung suchst, fügst du unsere optionalen Regeln explizit ein! Damit steigerst du dein Spielerlebnis auch dann, wenn du schon jahrelang Erfahrung hast.

Dich erwarten 12 Völker, von geisterhaft bis animalisch, mit liebevollen Illustrationen und detaillierten Hintergrundgeschichten. Sie alle können aus 260 magischen Talenten lernen und ihre angeborenen Kräfte freisetzen! Dabei entscheidest du ganz alleine wie du die Talente miteinander kombinierst. So wird ein Schwarzmagier auch mit sengendem Feuer seine Schwerter rasseln lassen und ein Heiler faszinierende Instrumente spielen können!

Auf über 300 Seiten findest du in Farbe alles Notwendige zu unseren Völkern, Talenten, Ausrüstungen, Antagonisten und mystische Orte in Verej’ka!

boardgame.name: Twisted Hoards
boardgame.description:
Magic and Unusual Treasure Troves for Four against Darkness - this book is a long, random table of mundane, magic and special items for your Four against Darkness adventures.

All items may be used for all levels of play. From food items to kitchen silverware, from explosive pumpkins to wearable werewolf fangs, this book has a little for everyone.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Four Against Darkness

boardgame.name: Paper Tales: Ce qui forge les légendes
boardgame.description:
This second expansion for Paper Tales contains 3 new buildings, 14 new units and 9 cards of a new type: Legendary Artefacts! These are very powerful and not affected by aging or Kingdom size limitations, but also very expensive to play.

Note: this expansion can be combined with the first one (Beyond the Gates) to play with 1, 6 or 7 players.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Paper Tales
Paper Tales: Beyond the Gates

boardgame.name: Feenlicht
boardgame.description:
Publisher blurb (translated with deepl):
Fairy Light is a role-playing system in which several friends create characters in a fantasy world, put themselves in those characters' shoes, and begin exploring that world under the guidance of a game master. The world of Fairy Light has its own kind of magic that is present everywhere. This is composed of the interaction of the various elements and gives it a gentle kind of mysticism. The role-playing is one of the quieter tones: there is no earth-shaking magic or sheer invincible heroes. The emphasis is on the development of the various characters rather than the compelling completion of life-threatening adventures (although that can happen too). Fairy Light with all its other books is freely available at feenlicht-rollenspiel.de and will remain so. If you are not sure yet if you want to own this book, you can get more information there. If you prefer leafing to wiping, if a pencil suits you more than digital ink and if you like to install heaps of bookmarks made of paper instead of bytes, then this book will give you the opportunity to let off steam as you wish.

Original German text:
Feenlicht ist ein Rollenspielsystem, bei dem mehrere Freunde Figuren in einer Fantasiewelt erschaffen, sich in diese Figuren hinein versetzen und unter Leitung eines Spielleiters beginnen, jene Welt zu erkunden. Die Welt von Feenlicht besitzt ihre eigene, überall gegenwärtige Art von Magie. Diese setzt sich aus dem Zusammenwirken der verschiedenen Elemente zusammen und verleiht ihr eine sanfte Art von Mystik. Das Rollenspiel ist eines der leiseren Töne: erderschütternde Magie oder schier unbesiegbare Helden gibt es nicht. Der Schwerpunkt liegt eher auf der Entwicklung der verschiedenen Charaktere als auf der zwingenden Absolvierung lebensgefährlicher Abenteuer (obwohl auch das vorkommen kann). Feenlicht mit all seinen weitern Büchern ist frei unter feenlicht-rollenspiel.de verfügbar und wird es auch bleiben. Wenn Sie sich noch nicht sicher sind, ob Sie dieses Buch besitzen wollen, dann können Sie sich dort informieren. Wenn Sie lieber blättern als zu wischen, wenn Ihnen ein Bleistift mehr liegt als digitale Tinte und wenn Sie gerne haufenweise Lesezeichen aus Papier statt aus Bytes installieren, dann haben Sie mit diesem Buch die Möglichkeit, sich nach Belieben auszutoben.

boardgame.name: May Contain Butts
boardgame.description:
May Contain Butts will keep you on the edge of your seat and have you barking like a dog as you look out for matches of goats, sloths, parrots and more!

The aim of the game is to spot a front and butt match and be the first to react, allowing you to pick up the cards. Watch out for the additional surprise action cards to trigger confusion - when the shout symbol is displayed you will have to make the noise of the animal on that card, or if you see a poop card this means its a race to place your hand in the middle.

Keep playing until someone runs out of cards - whoever has the most cards claims victory in this butt-tastic game!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Headhunter_2.0
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book (translated with deepl):
Headhunter_2.0 - a dark-cyberpunk role-playing game

It is the year 2135.
Cybernetic androids have become an indispensable part of our lives. They are called robots and should do heavy work for us. Many years of research brought new achievements and prostheses became more and more sophisticated.
Humans entered into a symbiosis with the machines. Their natural limitation.

The governments of many countries are controlled by powerful corporations. The greed for profit made the corporations put morals and ethics on the back burner. Experiments with human DNA and genetically engineered viruses were undertaken just to increase compatibility and thus sales.
Until there was an accident....

Original German text:
Headhunter_2.0 – ein Dark-Cyberpunk Rollenspiel

Wir schreiben das Jahr 2135.
Kybernetische Androiden sind aus unserem Leben nicht mehr wegzudenken. Sie werden Robots genannt und sollten und schwere Arbeiten abnehmen. Viele Jahre der Forschung brachten neue Errungenschaften und Prothesen wurden immer hochentwickelter.
Menschen gingen eine Symbiose mit den Maschinen ein. Ihre natürliche Bechränktheit.

Die Regierungen vieler Länder werden von mächtigen Konzernen kontrolliert. Die Profitgier brachte die Konzerne dazu Moral und Ethik zurückzustellen. Es wurden Experimente mit menschlicher DANN und genmanipulierten Viren unternommen, nur um die Verträglichkeit und somit auch den Absatz zu steigern.
Bis es einen Unfall gab….

boardgame.name: Guild Academies of Valeria
boardgame.description:
Visit the harbor to gain student dice and activate dock powers, build town structures that benefit the city, call upon the council to grant you favors, hire new guild masters, and build structures to educate your students. Then send graduates to complete quests and earn fabulous rewards or to the capital city to find other employment. Victory Points are earned throughout the game for your accomplishments and the player with the most points at the end of the game will have their academy declared the Royal Grand Academy of Valeria.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Nacho Stack!
boardgame.description:
Nacho average stacking game!

The game is played in two parts. Start by balancing the nachos on the base of the box which doubles up as your bowl. Then start rolling the dice to determine what colour nacho you have to carefully take off. Take care not to pick the wrong nacho or they’ll all come crashing down and result in minus points!

Play until there are no nachos left, add up your points to see who has claimed victory with the sauciest selection!

If this is too easy, you can attempt to play the advanced version with the '3 second rule' allowing you 3 seconds to quickly place any fallen nachos back on the pile, resulting in an unstable stack.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: X-Men House of X Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
Wolverine, Domino, Beast, Marvel Girl, Forge, and Sage handle the problems that Krakoan diplomacy can’t. With this Fast Forces, your opponent will soon be the one with the problem!

With the ability to suppress opposing powers, utilize Stealth, and great tactics, this thematic team will help you bring the excitement, subtlety, and action of X-Force to the tabletop!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Marvel Studios' What If...? Disney+ Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
There is plenty to look for including series regulars like The Scarlet Witch, Vision, Captain America, The Winter Soldier, Loki, Captain Carter as well as some of their greatest foes like Agatha Harkness, Infinity Ultron, and more! Players will find returning game mechanics like equipment-objects of some iconic items in the show like Captain America’s Shield, the Darkhold, and the Cloak of Levitation. Mission Points also return and can enhance Mission Point teams released in the last few sets!

Each Booster contains 5 figures and select boosters will contain an object.

As an extra special bonus, lucky players may find special boosters with multiple Chase figures inside!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: X-Men Rise and Fall Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
The X-Men are no stranger to struggle, but some foes will rock the entire GALAXY!
Based on the critically acclaimed story Rise & Fall of the Shi’ar Empire, this HeroClix release has everything! Vulcan is out for revenge against the X-Men, the Shi’ar, and their allies!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: At the Edge of Dreams
boardgame.description:
In At the Edge of Dreams, you play as the dreamer, wandering through a land beyond conscience, and encountering good and bad things.
Every omen you find and bring to focus while sleeping can be useful in your quest, but only if you don't get restless, or take too much time.
Can you control your dream landscape enough to achieve a lucid dream?

Gameplay

You start with a few tiles/cards on the table, and 3 stacks of new tiles/cards to the side.
Tiles/cards are double-sided. One side is a "dream", the other is an "omen".
Each turn you must play 1 tile onto your dream. You decide which side the tile will be played on, but only get to see the "dream" side before deciding.
You must bring "omens" into focus by placing adjacent dreams that match the omen requirements.
If you have too many omens of the same kind, you become restless, and those omens are removed, causing some dreams to become omens, which in turn can cause restlessness.
If you run out of tiles from two stacks, you wake up and lose.
You win by achieving a lucid dream by bringing all 6 types of omen into focus.


—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Ciemna Strona Mydła: Wpieniona Impreza
boardgame.description:
An add-on to the game "Ciemna Strona Mydła".

The expansion includes over 60 new cards, including new VETO cards (cancel someone else's effects), new effects, new words and more Dots for up to 10 players!
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Ciemna Strona Mydła

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Future Foundation Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
Reed Richards assembled the Future Foundation because an entire generation of geniuses would do more good than he ever could.

The Future Foundation Fast Forces brings all of the most well-known characters to a visible SKU: Mr. Fantastic, the Invisible Woman, The Thing, the Human Torch, Spider-Man, and Dr. Doom!

This is one of the best looking Fast Forces ever! With an increased scale and superior paint jobs, make sure to add this set to your HeroClix collection!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers War of the Realms Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
As Malekith wages war across the 10 realms, Thor and the Avengers team up to protect the earth from being conquered!

In this Fast Forces, find Avengers representing Midgard like Thor, Black Widow, and Black Panther along with Loki, Enchantress, and Executioner representing Asgard.

Fast Forces are awesome for someone getting started or looking to play a thematic team.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Nerds Dancin' Dice Game
boardgame.description:
Everyone knows that Nerds are active little candies that roll, bounce, & dance their way onto taste buds. Nerds Dancin' Dice is a goofy, Nerd-rolling challenge for up to 4 players where Nerds-shaped dice are roller for hilarious fun.

—description from the publisher

The instructions could be more clear, but basically you're rolling the nerds to achieve the desired positions on the prompt cards. Everyone rolls at the same time and whoever gets the combination first wins that round.

"Faceplant" cards are also part of the deck, though it doesn't really explain them well.

It's inspired by, but different from, Pass the Pigs. There are specific objectives each round. The colors are arbitrary, it seems. Only the positioning counts.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Fantastic Four Empyre Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
This 5-figure booster release features fan-favorite characters like Captain America, Mr. Fantastic, Spider-Man, and Deadpool, and their enemies like Super-Skrull, Magneto, Ultron, and more!

Empyre has more characters with RALLY that was first introduced in X-Men Rise and Fall earlier this year as well as brand-new mechanics like Recruiter and Follow-Up!

Chases from all different kinds of stories are included in this set including new versions of beloved characters like Thor, Herald of Thunder and Norrin Radd, Sorcerer Supreme!

Also find brand new “Legacy” cards for figures that might already be in your collection!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: X-Men Xavier's School Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
Xavier’s School for Gifted Youngsters is a special school led by Professor Charles Xavier where young mutants can grow, learn, and control their uncanny powers. See the results of their training on the tabletop with Marvel HeroClix: X-Men Xavier’s School!

Xavier’s School will have the return of ID cards, as well as student and headmaster gameplay. Two all-new title characters are sure to make a splash. You and your friends will be able to build your favorite X-Men teams from over the years – Blue Team, Gold Team, the X-Men led by Magneto, and many more! For even more mutant-mania this set will include more than a handful of previously unclixed figures including Phat, Goldballs, Mondo and Surge!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: X-Men Xavier's School Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
Celebrate the release of Marvel HeroClix: X-Men Xavier’s School with this all-new Fast Forces Set!

The Marvel HeroClix: X-Men Xavier’s School Fast Forces includes six figures with all-new dials, ready to play as a 300-point team! Not only does it feature fan-favorite mutants like Cyclops, Beast, Iceman and Jean Grey, but it also contains two characters never-before-seen in HeroClix – Rusty and Skids!

Once a player already has a Starter Set, a Fast Forces is a great way for them to build a thematic team.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Black Panther and the Illuminati Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
This 5-figure booster release features many fan-favorite sub-themes like The Avengers, Wakanda, The Cabal, Elders of the Universe, The Illuminati, as well as brand-new equipment-objects like the Cosmic Cube, Infinity Gems, and the Infinity Gauntlet!

Existing and new HeroClix fans will look forward to new figures and objects to power-up their collection in addition to never-before-Clixed characters like Astronomer, Challenger, Eitri, Enigma, Everett K. Ross, Kobik, Okoye, Rune, and more!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: The Unseen
boardgame.description:
A DEVIOUS PARTY GAME FOR ADULTS – A social deduction party game that turns friend against friend as a secret cult attempts to take over your town. Will the villagers be able to determine the cult leader’s identity before it’s too late?

A GREAT ALTERNATIVE TO REGULAR MURDER MYSTERY GAMES – 5 to 20 players, so everyone can get in on the fun. No player eliminations.

LEARN WHICH FRIENDS ARE THE MOST DEVIOUS – Think you know when your friend is lying? True identities will be revealed as players are forced to sow lies and deceit to win!

EASY TO LEARN - Players are given a Role Card and a Brainwashed Card. These determine which team the player is on. Then each player draws an Action that lets them gain info on another player or share their info with another player.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Black Panther and the Illuminati Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
Celebrate the release of Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Black Panther and the Illuminati with a new Fast Forces set featuring characters of Wakanda. Look for Ayo, Black Panther, Nakia, Okoye, Shuri, and White Tiger to represent Wakanda in this exciting new Fast Forces release. Wakanda Forever!

Once a player already has a Starter Set, a Fast Forces is a great way for them to construct a thematic team and build their collection!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Zombies Want Pizza
boardgame.description:
ONE PLAYER IS THE ZOMBIE, THE REST ARE PIZZA CHEFS - The chef with the most disgusting pizza wins! The losing chefs are eaten for dessert.

USE WEIRD INGREDIENTS TO MAKE THE WORLD'S MOST DISGUSTING PIZZA - Cards have ingredients such as dead flies, skunk spray, nose hair, dirty underwear, and more. Mix them to make the grossest pizza the world has ever seen!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers/Defenders War Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
Marvel HeroClix: Avengers/Defenders War Booster Brick will give the Shifting Focus mechanic to figures that have never had it before! Heroes can have the support of their allies when team building with this new set, whether it’s Captain America fighting alongside Iron Man or Daredevil teaming up with the Hulk or even Black Panther leading the Wakandan Warriors. There will be HeroClix 15th Anniversary Throwback figures to remind long time players of the early days of HeroClix and show off cool stuff from yesteryear to newer players! Exciting new sculpts on heroes returning to HeroClix after a long break! Last but not least, look into your crystal ball to see the unparalleled mysticism of an exciting new Dr. Strange!

The Marvel HeroClix: Avengers/Defenders War Booster Brick has over 70 new figures to collect.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers/Defenders War “Marvel Knights” Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
The Marvel HeroClix: Avengers/Defenders War “Marvel Knights” Fast Forces Pack includes 6 all-new dial designs featuring Daredevil along with other Marvel Knights characters including – Luke Cage, Iron Fist, Jessica Jones, Punisher, and Elektra! This Fast Forces Pack is an excellent product for new and established players offered at an impulse-friendly price point!

HeroClix Fast Forces Packs are designed for quick play and easy team-building for both tournaments and casual games.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Infinity Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Infinity comes to the tabletop in a whole new way. For the first time ever, Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Infinity will contain 4 standard size figures and a 2×2 Clix Base figure in EVERY booster! Discover new characters both small and large in this unprecedented release! This set features many classic Avengers like Thor, Hawkeye, and Jack of Hearts, as well as many space-centric teams like Infinity Watch featuring Adam Warlock, Drax, and Gamora, Guardians of the Galaxy in their origin stories like Star-Lord and Rocket Raccoon, and Spaceknights with Javelin and Terminator.

Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Infinity travels through space and time to find the most powerful beings in existence! In each booster, look for all-powerful cosmic beings like Eternity and Living Tribunal. You can also find other characters like Devil Dinosaur & Moon Girl as well as awesome vehicles like the Spider-Mobile!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Infinity Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
The Marvel HeroClix: Avengers Infinity Fast Forces includes six figures with all-new dials, ready to play in many different combinations! This Fast Forces features classic Avengers like Black Panther, Iron Man, and Hawkeye, as well as the Colossal Giant-Girl on a 2×2 base!

Once a player already has a Starter Set, a Fast Forces is a great way for them to build a thematic team.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America and the Avengers Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
This 5-figure booster release features many fan-favorite sub-themes like the Avengers, Thunderbolts, S.H.I.E.L.D., Stark Industries, and the Masters of Evil, as well as the return of ClixFX bases included with Chase figures and Shifting Focus featuring Iron Man. Marvel fans who aren’t reading comics every week are still going to recognize and enjoy this set since it features lots of characters they’ll recognize from the MCU, like Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Iron Man, Thor, Hulk, Happy Hogan, Ghost, Hawkeye, Pepper Potts, Ultron, and more!

Existing and new HeroClix fans will look forward to new figures to power-up their collection in addition to never-before-Clixed characters like Singularity, Roz Solomon, Azzuri, Arno Stark, Blackheath, Minotaur, Robbie Reyes, and more! Find new versions of beloved characters like the Immortal Hulk, Punisher War Machine, Earth X Thor, and some characters we haven’t seen in HeroClix in a while like Blade, Citizen V, and Jolt!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America and the Avengers Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
Celebrate the release of Marvel HeroClix: Captain America and the Avengers with a new Fast Forces set featuring characters of Avengers and Living Legends representing the lineage of Captain America and Citizen V. Look for Captain America, Isaiah Bradley, Citizen V, Hawkeye, Iron Man, and Winter Soldier in this exciting new Fast Forces release.

Once a player already has a Starter Set, a Fast Forces is a great way for them to construct a thematic team and build their collection!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Marvel HeroClix: Captain America Civil War Starter Set
Marvel HeroClix: Fantastic Four Cosmic Clash Starter Set

boardgame.name: Casket of Fays (Issue 6 - Jun 2022)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The sixth issue of Casket of Fays makes its appearance! Within its covers can be found an assortment of delights and darksome things to enhance your Dragon Warriors game!

Over The Gloaming Moor; a sandbox mini campaign

The Gloomvile; a monster from the campaign. along with the games, they play

A nasty bitter drink to get you going in the morn; Kaffeie

And, last but not least, the Mi'raj, not as nice a bunny as you might think

Update. Now includes Lost Knight at the Ford, a chilling encounter

boardgame.name: Bretwalda: Danelag
boardgame.description:
865 AD. The Great Heathen Army crosses the North Sea to invade England. Rules of Northumbria, Mercia, Wessex, and East Anglia prepare their kingdoms for the inevitable conflict.

Take control of the Viking raiders, establish a new mighty Dane kingdom, and spread Danelaw across the Anglo-Saxon lands. Use diplomacy, coercion, and, if necessary brute, military strength to overcome your rivals.

Claim England for the Danes. Become the Bretwalda.

Danelag is an expansion for the base game, taking it to 5 players. The fifth player takes charge of the Viking raiders and a new Danish kingdom established on the shores of England. His goal: to spread Danelaw across the Anglo-Saxon lands and claim the crown of Bretwalda, the Britain-ruler.

Danes function in a similar way as other factions in the game, though there are some key differences. First, they begin the game in any coastal area not adjacent to an Anglo-Saxon Capital area. Second, with their ships – drakkars – already on the board, they’re much more mobile than the Anglo-Saxon kingdoms. Third, they have a different set of Kingdom Tiles as well as Chronicle and Lordship cards.

The expansion adds a fifth Kingdom Board, Dane rulers, and a new set of miniatures for the Danes, with Ceorls replaced by Settlers, Thegns with Vikings, and an Ealdorman with a Jarl. However, other than their names, they function similarly to Anglo-Saxon miniatures. Since Danes weren’t Christians at that time, they build Longhouses instead of Abbeys.

Danelag also enhances the core game with additional Seasons to make the gameplay even more entertaining and replayable.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Bretwalda

boardgame.name: Hush: Titan's Bend
boardgame.description:
May 2022 episode for Hush.

Includes:

Map postcard: Titan's Bend
Character card
Nocturnal Creature card
Spirit card
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Hush

boardgame.name: Hush: Four Points
boardgame.description:
June 2022 episode for Hush.

Includes:

Map postcard: Four Points
Character card
Nocturnal Creature card
Spirit card
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Hush

boardgame.name: Celestials
boardgame.description:
The time of the void is ending, which Celestial will take its place! Using the power of one of the celestials, deceive, deduct and question your opponents to collect the correct cards and take your place as head of the Celestials.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Squabblin Goblins: MacGuffin
boardgame.description: A 2-card expansion for Squabblin Goblins.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Squabblin Goblins

boardgame.name: Squabblin Goblins: Shoot the Moon
boardgame.description: A 2-card expansion for Squabblin Goblins.
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Squabblin Goblins

boardgame.name: Final Strike
boardgame.description:
Final Strike is a competitive deck forging game, where players strategize for position, fighting for the glory of defeating enemies and earning the glory that comes with dealing - the Final Strike.

All players start with the same starting deck, and will shuffle and draw a hand of 5 cards to begin the game. On any given players turn, players MUST play one weapon on their turn - dealing that weapons damage to a monster and collecting that much blood from their target (knowing that every 4 points of blood will be turned into 1 point of Glory at the end of the game, and the player with the most glory at the end of the game being the winner!)

The player can choose to play a stronger weapon that deals more damage, or use a "Magic Hammer" that deals only 1 damage, in order to forge a weapon from their discard pile, destroying it and gaining a new more powerful weapon from the blacksmith - a randomized market of weapons, ranging from strong re-occurring played effects, ongoing field abilities, or the tactics to deal extra damage when that weapon is shuffled from a discard pile back into their deck!

While dealing damage is one way to victory, true 'glory' can be found by dealing the 'Final Strike', aka removing the last point of blood from an enemy - earning the reward listed on the bottom of that foe.

The game progress over three 'Act"s with each act ending when the boss for that act is defeated - where as all players will then wash off all their blood (converting them into glory at that time.)

After the Act 3 boss has been defeated and the final rewards have been tallied - the player with the most glory, is deemed the winner of Final Strike!

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Bandada: Promo Pack #1
boardgame.description:
What do I see at the bird feeder? It's new birds, ready to join your Bandada!

Promo Pack #1' contains 3 NEW BIRDS that can be added straight into your copy of Bandada.

The Red-Tailed Hawk is ready to swoop in and swap the values of one blue die with one yellow die. It can also score you points for the lowest value blue die.

The Goldfinch can potentially set you up for a big turn by letting you set one black die to ANY value. But its scoring section is all or nothing.

And the Mockingbird is going to live up to its name by copying the action of ANY visible bird. Then it shows its individuality by scoring based on the difference between the highest blue and the lowest yellow dice.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Bandada

boardgame.name: On a Moonless Night
boardgame.description:
From the publisher:
On a Moonless Night is a tabletop roleplaying game of occult investigation, horror, and collaborative storytelling.
